nodes.bodyText: Did you try to see if the styles that are not opacity can be moved into CSS classes? Maybe we can use a .alert-banner.alert-banner-warning style.
👍 Using a class would also help to keep the colors from our new color palette in sync for all items that should use the same semantic. (And theming will be much simpler as well.)
As I mentioned before, I think it would be better to move as much as possible to CSS
Maybe you could add a second CSS class to the icons and make them. They feel a bit underwhelming right now, maybe you could try increasin the size to 2rem or 2.5rem
